CustomField.formula:
IF(NOT(ISNULL(amc__Actual_End_Time__c)),TEXT(amc__Actual_End_Time__c), IF(LEN(TEXT( VALUE(TEXT(amc__Start_Hour__c)) + FLOOR(amc__Hours_Scheduled__c))) = 1, '0','') & IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(amc__Start_Hour__c)), '00', TEXT( VALUE(TEXT(amc__Start_Hour__c)) + FLOOR(amc__Hours_Scheduled__c)))
& ":" & IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND( ((VALUE(TEXT(amc__Start_Minute__c))/60) + MOD(amc__Hours_Scheduled__c,1) ) * 60, 0))) = 1, '0','') & IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(amc__Start_Minute__c)), '00', TEXT(ROUND( ((VALUE(TEXT(amc__Start_Minute__c))/60) + MOD(amc__Hours_Scheduled__c,1) ) * 60, 0))) )
CustomField.label: End Time
